channel.title: General PTT key?
channel.description:
O.k. So there have been numerous software I've used in the past from games to VIOP systems that lacked push-to-talk. Now I use push-to-talk all the time, its good for if I want speakers and also other people don't have to hear my background. The most recent software being the game [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=10626']PAYDAY[/url]
I'm getting quite tired of this, and wondered if there was a software or something I can do with windows to have a universal PTT key across all software.

item.title: General PTT key?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I have many VOIP programs. The problem here would be talking to ppl in the game payday. My friends don’t own payday so I have to play with random people. This also doesn’t solve the problem other games not having push to talk.

Read full topic

item.title: General PTT key?
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
Just use Vent when you play with your friends, and you’ll be good to go.

Read full topic
